item.title: Helldivers 2: Into the Unjust Launches Next Week
item.content:encoded:
Helldivers 2 is getting a fresh content drop next week with its Into the Unjust update, following on from the long-awaited Xbox launch and Halo ODST Legendary Warbond.

The stacked Halo ODST Legendary Warbond is full of treats, but comes at a price, though the next big update in Helldivers 2 is right around the corner, bringing with it a host of new content.

From a new Premium Warbond filled with new weapons and armor, to new challenges to explore, the Into the Unjust update has plenty to offfer.

Helldivers 2: Into the Unjust Launches September 2

Announced in the PlayStation blog, Into the Unjust in Helldivers 2 pushes players into a fresh battle against the Terminids into unknown territory, seemingly with a challenge that won’t allow you to call in Stratagems.

The teaser blog details disappearing “into the fog” to “discover new dangers”. It’s explained that “because of the nature of the caves, your Super Destroyer won’t be able to give you full support.” As a result, it’s your squad facing up against the Terminids alone.

New enemy types are also detailed, with “a new subterranean species of Terminid Warriors, Bile Spewers, and Chargers,” along with the Dragonroach, and “more terrifying creatures lying in wait on Hive Worlds.”

New challenges include escorting a mobile oil rig, locating and destroying the Hive Lung, along with new optional and sub-objectives too.

As is customary in Helldivers 2, the new drop of content also comes alongside a new Premium Warbond, called Dust Devils, which will “ensure survival in the harshest conditions these worlds can throw your way.”

The Warbond includes a primary weapon, a new throwable, and three unique stratagems, all of which launch on September 4.

Are you planning to pick up the latest Premium Warbond in Helldivers 2? Let us know in the Insider Gaming forum.

For more news, take a look at leaked Battlefield 6 Camos, and check out how The Division 2 was saved by a team of five developers.
